title: 3dTto1D
description: Collapse a 4D time series to a 1D time series

input_dataset.title: Input Dataset
input_dataset.description: Specify input dataset. This should be a set of 3D time series. If the input is in 1D format, a transpose operator will typically be required.

method.title: Conversion Method
method.description: Specify 4D to 1D conversion method. Methods include: enorm, dvars, srms, shift_srms, mdiff, smdiff, 4095_count, 4095_frac, 4095_warn.

prefix.title: Output Prefix
prefix.description: Specify output file. Default is stdout
